## Writing functions

```{r}
 temp_f_to_c <- function(f){ 
   temp_in_degree = (5/9)*(f-32)
   print(temp_in_degree)
 }
 
temp_f_to_c(100)
```

```{r}
intro <- function(hometown, age){
  paste0("I am ", as.numeric(age), " and I am from ", as.character(hometown))
}

intro(hometown= "Nepal", 22)
```
